consentBanner.title: We use cookies
consentBanner.content: We use cookies and local storage to ensure you get the best experience on our website. By using our website, you agree to our use of cookies and local storage. Declining consent may result in suboptimal website performance.

search.info: Navigate using ↑ and ↓ or ↹. Select using ↵.

tags.title: Tags
tags.caption: Tags
tags.hint: Add up to 5 tags to describe what your question is about.

simp.title: Enable Simp
simp.hint: Users, as well as our in-house AI chatbot will be able to reply to your question to help provide you with the best help possible.

users.title: Only Users
users.hint: Only Users will be able to upload answers to your question.

answerEditor.title: Answer this question
answerEditor.noPermission: As a guest you are not permitted to submit an answer.

auth.description: We're using an external identity provider (IDP). Therefore, you will have to be redirected to another page in order to view and update your login information. You will also have the possibility of adding other login methods to your current account.

more.description: Nous avons d'autres produits à explorer !
more.link: Testez notre application de chat SimpleChat

trending.title: Trending Questions
trending.caption: Here are some of the most popular questions on our platform right now.

myQuestions.title: My Questions
myQuestions.caption: Here are all the questions you have posted on our platform.
